EN:
The free bar in Taipei integrates a vibrant atmosphere, creative cocktails and excellent services, making it an excellent choice for the bustling nightlife in the city.

Stepping into the Bar Freedom bar, you will be immediately shocked by its eclectic and seductive atmosphere.The bar integrates industrial unique decoration with a comfortable and intimate seat arrangement.The soft light and elegant decoration create a warm and relaxed atmosphere, which is very suitable for relaxing the body and mind or starting at night after a long day.

The cocktails of free bars are impressive, providing various innovation and classic choices.The bartender here is a real artist, and they cleverly adjust the beautiful and delicious drinks.The excellent cocktails include "free bells" (refreshing mixed wine of Du Songzi wine, bone wood flowers and citrus) and "free Fitz" (pleasant mixture of vodka, passion fruit and champagne).Each drink is carefully balanced and carefully presented.

Bar Freedom's staff is friendly, careful and knowledgeable.They spend time to ensure that each guest has a good experience. Whether it is a cocktail that recommends drinks and customized for your taste, it is just a pleasant conversation.Their professional spirit and sincerity and enthusiasm for craftsmanship have enhanced the fun of the entire visit.

The free bar has attracted various active people from locals to tourists, and they all want to enjoy the unique products of the bar.The atmosphere here is optimistic and leisurely. It is a good place for leisure and festivals.The music is carefully planned and complement the atmosphere, but it will not overwhelm the dialogue.

"I attended a two -day meeting and lived in Licheng Hotel, Taipei. Surprisingly, just next to the hotel, I found the best bar. I went to these bars for two consecutive nights. Welcome to me warmly, very professional, friendly, and grateful to take care of me. There are some special dishes provided by the bartender. It is surprising that the cost is accepted and low.

I accidentally discovered when I was walking nearby.
I usually don't go to the bar, so I am a little nervous, but I think the price is quite reasonable.
The most important thing is that drinks and snacks are delicious and the atmosphere is great.

I don't think this is a place where you can play with a large group of people, but a place where you can drink a drink with a small group or be a couple by the way.
The clerk is also very polite.

I have been fortunate to visit the free bar recently. This experience definitely shocked me!From the moment I walked in, the atmosphere here was very attractive, and the staff was very friendly and careful.However, it is a drink that really grabs the storm -each one is more unique and delicious than the previous one!Bar Freedom's bartender is a real craftsman. The bartending they prepared is both visual impact and flavor.Whether you are a cocktail appreciation or just trying to try some fresh and exciting things, Bar Freedom is a must -visit destination.I strongly recommend it -five stars!

I found a cockroach that was close to the food on the bar.The staff wiped it off, only to say sorry.We are disappointed with services.We believe that all customers attach great importance to health and service issues.

EN:
My experience here is very complicated.The first night I came was Thursday evening/Friday morning, around 1 am.I just stayed in the nearby Licheng Hotel, after a few hours of flight (delay!), I was glad to find that the bar is still open.The bartender is very friendly, but it is not talkative, and the modulated drink is great.It's really suitable for relaxation.I drank a few glasses of wine, gave a lot of tips, and planned to make it this week's regular stay.

My experience the next night is the opposite.The bartender the night before was gone, and replaced it with the atmosphere of the boss/manager.When I walked in, he looked at me up and down, and then asked me if I had a booking.When I answered, he asked me if I was alone.I confirm that I am.Then he took me through all the empty positions in the bar and asked me to sit in the corner behind, behind some bar equipment, so obviously I would not be seen by anyone, and then told me that I would only order from him.Not friendly, no smile, almost a bit threatened.

When I sat down, I found that compared with other customers, I was very casual, but wearing a polo shirt and shorts, so I was not very embarrassed.If he just told me that I had dressing requirements that night, I could leave, but I was really troubled. Obviously he was happy to take my money, but obviously he really didn't want me to be there.I have been in Taiwan for decades, and I have encountered this attitude for the first time.

Anyway, I don't know what I did worthy of this guy, but I don't recommend coming here.Unfortunately -I really enjoyed my first night, but the next night I destroyed my original impression.
The cool atmosphere and amazing cocktail.The boss spoke so cool, and also called out one of the best Martini I drank in Taipei.Personal favorite is No.3.
The drink is delicious, the taste is very special, the most surprising is the food.It should be appropriate to spend a cold weekend with friends.
The atmosphere is very good, very quiet, and the music is very nice.Suitable for bringing girlfriends.
Cute places and staff, great Conop tea cocktail ğŸ˜‰ ...
The atmosphere in the store is elegant, not club music, but soft music. I like the owner.
Very good staff and comfortable places.The drink is great, and the boss makes us very happy.Will definitely come back again
Friendly staff and delicious drinks.Hidden good place
Delicious
Dead cocktails and services
A good place to meet with friends
Gentle and sexy.
Good place
Very chill
